page.title: 19Food
page.content: At{breakfast}time our family eats cereal, toast and sometimes a cooked meal of bacon, sausages and eggs. I carry to school a{packed lunch}of fruit, crisps and sandwiches. I have a {cooked meal}in the evening and on Sunday we have a roast or casserole. When I have a{party}I like savoury foods as well as jelly and ice cream. On{Christmas Day}we have roast turkey and{Christmas}pudding and Mummy makes pancakes on{Shrove Tuesday.}I like to eat fish and chips with a fizzy drink or milk shake when I have a meal in a {restaurant. Many foods are now deep frozen and cooking in a{microwave oven}is much quicker. We grow some fruit and vegetables in our garden but we buy most of our food.
